you.translation[0].definitions[0].defini: used to refer to a person or group of people when speaking or writing to them
you.translation[0].definitions[0].exampl: I have some news for you.
The letter is addressed to both of you.
Did Robin give you the money?
Only you can make this decision.
You boys have got to learn to behave yourselves.
Hey, you over there! Get out of the way!
you.translation[0].definitions[1].exampl: You have to be 21 or over to buy alcohol in Florida.
You can never be sure what Emily is thinking.
